特記事項: 【合併】英語IIｂ　８（経済学部）/英語IIIｂ　８（経済学部）
授業方法:
Various methods including, pair and group work, listening exercises, dialog construction and presentation.
Each class will consist of various speaking and listening skills, pair work and group activities. Creating and writing theme-based dialogs and presenting them will also be included.

第1回: Introductions, course overview, rules and advice, group interview chart, short self-introductions
Review of class introduction and rules.  45 minute preparation.
第2回: Text:  pronunciation practice, listening comprehension drills, What is Japan famous for?
Dialog construction from the in-class material.  One hour or more of study.
第3回: pair work information gap activity, key words - vocabulary building
Key words worksheet assignment.  One hour of study.
第4回: personal news reports, country and people - country and currency, homework topic
Cultural communicative gap exercises.  One hour or more of study.
第5回: short speech from homework assignment and feedback, pair work information gap activity
Rewriting  the in-class short speech.  One hour or more of out of class study.
第6回: personal news reports, environment vocabulary, short essay writing
Internet search of suggested topics.  One hour of study.
第7回: prepositions - rules and exceptions, class interview chart, expressing opinions
More preposition study worksheet assignment.  One hour of out of class study.
第8回: personal news reports, conversational dialog construction and presentation
Related conversational techniques.  One hour of preparation.
第9回: Cultural Questions II, keeping the discussion going conversational techniques
Report:  country to be announced.  One hour or more of study.
第10回: personal news reports, pair work information gap activity, What do you say when...? homework: news topic assigned
Presentation preparation.  One hour or more of out of class study.
第11回: Situational dialog construction and presentations, Meeting a Foreigner in Japan dialog
Review and extend the meeting a foreigner dialog.  One hour of study.
第12回: personal news reports, pair work information gap activity, Find Someone Who... activity
Preparation for final question and answer session.  One hour of out of class study.
第13回: group activity interview chart, course overview, exam explanation, question and answer session
Study for exam.  One hour or more of study.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students would be advised to do as much personal study outside the classroom as possible.  Also, to submit any homework assignments on time.
